resources.string:
Overview:
Recipal allows you to create, share, rate, search and store recipes locally on your device. Storing the recipes locally allows access to your recipes even with out being connected to the Internet.

FAQ

Recipe Searching:
Recipes can be searched. However the search only searches the recipe titles

Recipe Sharing:
Recipes can be shared by Bumping them. However the image will not be transfered.
Send: Send a recipe by clicking the send icon in the menu when viewing the recipe.
Receive: To receive a recipe press the receive icon on the main dashboard.

View:
When viewing all recipes, if you shake the device it will load a random recipe.
